settings.heading: PRODUCTS
settings.question_1: WHICH SKIN TYPES ARE REVU PRODUCTS SUITABLE FOR?
settings.answer_1: All revu products are developed in partnership with chemists. They are primarily formulated for SENSITIVE skin types, which means, as a result, they are suitable for all skin types ��. Full ingredient lists are available on each product page and for any concerns, we recommend conducting a patch test or sharing our ingredient list with your healthcare provider before usage.
